import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'quiz-app-quiz', templateUrl: './quiz.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quiz.component.scss'], }) export class QuizComponent { state = { questionNo: 1, score: 0, question: 'What does CSS stand for?', options: [ 'Cascading Style Sheets', 'Creative Style Sheets', 'Cascading Style Screen', 'Cascading Stop Sheets', ], }; }

What does CSS stand for?
